snippet.title: Curses of Tarot: Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
The second trailer for our upcoming game Curses of Tarot focuses on gameplay. 
Available January 11, 2022 -- wishlist on Steam today!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1803510/Curses_of_Tarot/


Curses of Tarot is a single-player poker and Tarot themed deckbuilding card game with a variety of play modes, mini-games and challenges. Swap cards to create poker hands and clear each board, fortify your deck with boons, break curses, and test your fate in a variety of special events!


#gaming #indiegames #indiegame #gameplay #trailertuesday #videogames #cardgames
